Package proj

Class StudentListCtrl

java.lang.Object
proj.StudentListCtrl
public class StudentListCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the control class for studentList which holds an array list of Students
Since:
2020-11-19
Version:
1.0
Author:
DSAI/1 Group 5

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    StudentListCtrl()
    Reads in the list of students from SerializeDB

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Adds a new Student to this control class's studentList

    Gets the student's MatricID from Student in the studentList ArrayList with the username that is inputted

    When called, save the current edited studentList object to SerializeDB

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentListCtrl

      public StudentListCtrl()
      Reads in the list of students from SerializeDB

  • Method Details

    • getStudentList

      public java.util.ArrayList<Student> getStudentList()
      Gets the student list stored in this studentListControl class
      Returns:
      ArrayList of students

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent​(int i)
      Gets a student from this control class's studentList indexed by the parameter i
      Parameters:
      i - index of the student in the studentList
      Returns:
      a Student object

    • getStudentListSize

      public int getStudentListSize()
      Gets the number of students from this control class's studentList
      Returns:
      number of Students in the studentList

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String pw, char gender, java.lang.String nationality, java.lang.String matricID, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String schoolID)
      Adds a new Student to this control class's studentList
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the student to be added.
      username - Username of the student to be added.
      pw - Password of the student to be added.
      gender - Gender of the student to be added.
      nationality - Nationality of the student to be added.
      matricID - Matriculation ID of the student to be added.
      email - Email of the student to be added.
      schoolID - School of the Student to be added.

    • editStudent

      public void editStudent​(java.lang.String s, int choice)
      Allows admin user to edit Student stored in the studentList ArrayList
      Parameters:
      s - Name of the Student to be edited
      choice - integer to be passed in to determine which option of the student details to edit 1 for student name, 2 for username, 3 for password, 4 for matric ID, 5 for email, 6 for gender, 7 for nationality, 8 for school, 9 to exit

    • deleteStudent

      public void deleteStudent​(java.lang.String s)
      Allows admin user to remove a Student from the studentList ArrayList
      Parameters:
      s - The username of the student to be deleted

    • printStudentListByUsername

      public void printStudentListByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
      Prints student detail of a student in the studentList ArrayList, along with username, name, ID, Email, Nationality and School
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student whose details would be printed

    • printStudentDetailsByIndex

      public void printStudentDetailsByIndex​(int index)
      Prints details of a indexed Student in the studentList
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the Student to be printed in studentList

    • printAllStudentDetails

      public void printAllStudentDetails()
      Prints details of all students in the studentList Calls print student by index recursively

    • getStudentFromUsername

      public Student getStudentFromUsername​(java.lang.String username)
      Gets student object from studentList Array using the student's username
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student object to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the Student object that has the username inputted

    • getMatricNo

      public java.lang.String getMatricNo​(java.lang.String username)
      Gets the student's MatricID from Student in the studentList ArrayList with the username that is inputted
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student that we are getting MatricID from
      Returns:
      MatriID of student from the studentList ArrayList of the same username inputted

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName​(java.lang.String username)
      Gets the name of the student from the studentList ArrayList with username that is inputted
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student that we want to get the name from
      Returns:
      Name of the student of the associated username from studentList ArrayList

    • save

      public void save()
      When called, save the current edited studentList object to SerializeDB
